LanguageData.Sarge945.CombatReadinessGizmoDesc: Draft and equip a combat outfit before moving to a location, and change back when undrafting
LanguageData.Sarge945.CombatReadinessGizmoDesc2: Draft and equip a combat outfit before moving to defensive positions, and change back when undrafting
LanguageData.Sarge945.CombatReadinessShowGizmosLabel: Show Original Gizmo alongside Defensive Gizmo
